p: SARS-CoV-2 is a novel emerging contagious agent that found a way into human civilization. The outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 is the third pandemic of the 21st century and the situation is still ongoing. The prediction of Fan et al. [ 24] that a future SARS or MERS-like CoVs epidemic would emerge in China with a probable bat source became reality when the first case of concentrated viral pneumonia was reported on December 30, 2019 in Wuhan city of China [ 25]. Later on, the novel coronavirus designated as SARS-CoV-2 was found responsible for the viral outbreak of pneumonia in Wuhan [ 26].
